mapper.select: select distinct l.id,l.label_name,count(al.label_id) as labelCount from blog_label l left join blog_articles_label al on l.id = al.label_id group by l.id order by count(al.label_id) desc
select bl.id,bl.label_name from blog_articles_label bal,blog_label bl where bal.articles_id = #{id} and bal.label_id = bl.id
